remarks:
Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution, that does not use ~ ax-c9 .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-May-2018.) 

---

 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-May-2018.)
statement:
cbv3.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbv3.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbv3.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
cbv3 $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
